languages.text: "Что ж, я сам{mf||а} отыщу этих неуловимых беглецов. Что касается тебя, Вистенца, то это был твой последний провал. Я отстраняю тебя от управления планетой и помещаю под арест. Когда покончу с бунтовщиками — решу, что делать с тобой".

traits.locale_text: "Что ж, я сам{mf||а} отыщу этих неуловимых беглецов. Что касается тебя, Вистенца, то это был твой последний провал. Я отстраняю тебя от управления планетой и помещаю под арест. Когда покончу с бунтовщиками — решу, что делать с тобой".

languages.text: "Well, I'll track down these elusive fugitives myself. As for you, Vistenza, you will not be permitted to fail again. I am removing you from your post as governor of this planet and I am placing you under arrest. When I have finished with the rebels, I'll decide what to do with you."
languages.original_text: "Что ж, я сам{mf||а} отыщу этих неуловимых беглецов. Что касается тебя, Вистенца, то это был твой последний провал. Я отстраняю тебя от управления планетой и помещаю под арест. Когда покончу с бунтовщиками — решу, что делать с тобой".

traits.locale_text: "Well, I'll track down these elusive fugitives myself. As for you, Vistenza, you will not be permitted to fail again. I am removing you from your post as governor of this planet and I am placing you under arrest. When I have finished with the rebels, I'll decide what to do with you."

"Well, I'll track down these elusive fugitives myself. As for you, Vistenza, you will not be permitted to fail again. I am removing you from your post as governor of this planet and I am placing you under arrest. When I have finished with the rebels, I'll decide what to do with you."

"Well, I'll track down these elusive fugitives myself. As for you, Vistenza, you will not be permitted to fail again. I am removing you from your post as governor of this planet and I am placing you under arrest. When I have finished with the rebels, I'll decide what to do with you."

"Well, I'll track down these elusive fugitives myself. As for you, Vistenza, you will not be permitted to fail again. I am removing you from your post as governor of this planet and I am placing you under arrest. When I have finished with the rebels, I'll decide what to do with you."

languages.text: “很好，我会亲自追捕这群行踪诡秘的逃犯。至于你，维丝坦萨，我已经不想让你再次令我失望了。我立刻解除你这颗行星的总督职务，并下令将你逮捕。等我处理完那群叛军之后，我再决定该如何处置你。”
languages.original_text: "Well, I'll track down these elusive fugitives myself. As for you, Vistenza, you will not be permitted to fail again. I am removing you from your post as governor of this planet and I am placing you under arrest. When I have finished with the rebels, I'll decide what to do with you."

traits.locale_text: “很好，我会亲自追捕这群行踪诡秘的逃犯。至于你，维丝坦萨，我已经不想让你再次令我失望了。我立刻解除你这颗行星的总督职务，并下令将你逮捕。等我处理完那群叛军之后，我再决定该如何处置你。”

languages.text: «De acuerdo, encontraré a estos esquivos fugitivos personalmente. En cuanto a usted, Vistenza, no tendrá otra oportunidad de fallarme. Queda relevada del cargo de gobernadora del planeta y arrestada. Cuando acabe con los rebeldes volveré para decidir qué hacer con usted».
languages.original_text: "Well, I'll track down these elusive fugitives myself. As for you, Vistenza, you will not be permitted to fail again. I am removing you from your post as governor of this planet and I am placing you under arrest. When I have finished with the rebels, I'll decide what to do with you."

traits.locale_text: «De acuerdo, encontraré a estos esquivos fugitivos personalmente. En cuanto a usted, Vistenza, no tendrá otra oportunidad de fallarme. Queda relevada del cargo de gobernadora del planeta y arrestada. Cuando acabe con los rebeldes volveré para decidir qué hacer con usted».

languages.text: 「さて、うまく逃げおおせた逃亡者の追跡は任せてもらおう。総督の仕事についてだが、ヴィステンツァ、二度目の失敗は許されないと思え。この星の総督から解任して逮捕する方向で考えている。反乱軍を鎮圧してから、お前の処遇を考えようじゃないか」
languages.original_text: "Well, I'll track down these elusive fugitives myself. As for you, Vistenza, you will not be permitted to fail again. I am removing you from your post as governor of this planet and I am placing you under arrest. When I have finished with the rebels, I'll decide what to do with you."

traits.locale_text: 「さて、うまく逃げおおせた逃亡者の追跡は任せてもらおう。総督の仕事についてだが、ヴィステンツァ、二度目の失敗は許されないと思え。この星の総督から解任して逮捕する方向で考えている。反乱軍を鎮圧してから、お前の処遇を考えようじゃないか」

languages.text: "Nun, ich werde diese schwer zu fassenden Flüchtigen selbst aufspüren. Und Ihr, Vistenza, werdet nicht erneut versagen. Ich enthebe Euch Eures Postens als Gouverneurin dieses Planeten und stelle Euch unter Arrest. Wenn ich mit den Rebellen fertig bin, werde ich entscheiden, was ich mit Euch mache."
languages.original_text: "Well, I'll track down these elusive fugitives myself. As for you, Vistenza, you will not be permitted to fail again. I am removing you from your post as governor of this planet and I am placing you under arrest. When I have finished with the rebels, I'll decide what to do with you."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, ich werde diese schwer zu fassenden Flüchtigen selbst aufspüren. Und Ihr, Vistenza, werdet nicht erneut versagen. Ich enthebe Euch Eures Postens als Gouverneurin dieses Planeten und stelle Euch unter Arrest. Wenn ich mit den Rebellen fertig bin, werde ich entscheiden, was ich mit Euch mache."

languages.text: « Bien, je vais traquer ces fugitifs insaisissables moi-même. Quant à vous, Vistenza, vous n'avez pas su vous montrer à la hauteur. Je vous démets de vos fonctions de gouverneure de cette planète et vous place aux arrêts. Je déciderai de votre sort lorsque j'en aurai terminé avec les rebelles. »
languages.original_text: "Well, I'll track down these elusive fugitives myself. As for you, Vistenza, you will not be permitted to fail again. I am removing you from your post as governor of this planet and I am placing you under arrest. When I have finished with the rebels, I'll decide what to do with you."

traits.locale_text: « Bien, je vais traquer ces fugitifs insaisissables moi-même. Quant à vous, Vistenza, vous n'avez pas su vous montrer à la hauteur. Je vous démets de vos fonctions de gouverneure de cette planète et vous place aux arrêts. Je déciderai de votre sort lorsque j'en aurai terminé avec les rebelles. »

languages.text: "Öyleyse o ele geçmez kaçakları ben bulacağım. Sana gelirsek Vistenza, beni bir daha yüzüstü bırakma fırsatın olmayacak. Seni gezegen valiliği makamından alıyor ve tutukluyorum. Kaderine isyancılarla işim bittiğinde karar vereceğim."
languages.original_text: "Well, I'll track down these elusive fugitives myself. As for you, Vistenza, you will not be permitted to fail again. I am removing you from your post as governor of this planet and I am placing you under arrest. When I have finished with the rebels, I'll decide what to do with you."

traits.locale_text: "Öyleyse bu kaypak kaçakları ben bulacağım. Beni bir daha yüzüstü bırakma fırsatın olmayacak Vistenza. Seni gezegen valisi makamından alıyor ve tutukluyorum. Kaderine isyancılarla işim bittiğinde karar vereceğim."
